layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x39
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x39
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x23
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x23 [color=#000080]
        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x23 [border: none (3px solid #000080)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (3,0) size 254x19
            text run at (3,0) width 254: "This box should be open ended at the top."
